alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 11:07PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Jefferson County through 1130 PM CDT... At 1106 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Reynolds, or 7 miles south of Fairbury, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Endicott around 1115 PM CDT. Steele City around 1120 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southeastern Nebraska.
